```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Used in paper 2/6/22
pet3int7scale <- glm(Percentvisited ~ scaledayl + scalesrad + scaletmax + scaletmin + scale6precip + scaletmin * scaledayl, data = ballforscale)
summary(pet3int7scale)
confint(pet3int7scale)

## Max temp, min temp, and vapor pressure are super correlated

rab1 <- glm(Percentvisited ~ scaledayl + scaleprecip + scalesrad + scaletmax + scalendvi + scale6precip, data = ballforscale)
summary(rab1)
BIC(rab1)
with(summary(rab1), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)

# Minus srad
rab2 <- glm(Percentvisited ~ scaledayl + scaleprecip + scaletmax + scalendvi + scale6precip, data = ballforscale)
summary(rab2)
BIC(rab2)
with(summary(rab2), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)

# Minus precip
rab3 <- glm(Percentvisited ~ scaledayl + scaletmax + scalendvi + scale6precip, data = ballforscale)
summary(rab3)
BIC(rab3)
with(summary(rab3), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)

# Minus ndvi
rab4 <- glm(Percentvisited ~ scaledayl + scaletmax + scale6precip, data = ballforscale)
summary(rab4)
BIC(rab4)
with(summary(rab4), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)

# With interaction of day length and tmax** Best one.
rab5 <- glm(Percentvisited ~ scaledayl + scaletmax + scale6precip + scaledayl * scaletmax, data = ballforscale)
summary(rab5)
BIC(rab5)
with(summary(rab5), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)

# With interaction of day length and 6 precip
rab6 <- glm(Percentvisited ~ scaledayl + scaletmax + scale6precip + scale6precip * scaletmax, data = ballforscale)
summary(rab6)
BIC(rab6)
with(summary(rab6), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)

# With interaction of 6 precip and tmax
rab7 <- glm(Percentvisited ~ scaledayl + scaletmax + scale6precip + scale6precip * scaletmax, data = ballforscale)
summary(rab7)
BIC(rab7)
with(summary(rab7), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)

# With interaction of 6 precip, tmax, and day length
rab8 <- glm(Percentvisited ~ scaledayl + scaletmax + scale6precip + scale6precip * scaletmax * scaledayl, data = ballforscale)
summary(rab8)
BIC(rab8)
with(summary(rab8), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)


### GLM dist to water

bun <- glm(MeanClosedist ~ scaledayl + scaleprecip + scalesrad + scaletmax + scalendvi + scale6precip, data = jovenv, na.action = na.exclude)
summary(bun)
with(summary(bun), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)
confint(bun)

# Minus srad
bun1 <- glm(MeanClosedist ~ scaledayl + scaleprecip + scaletmax + scalendvi + scale6precip, data = jovenv, na.action = na.exclude)
summary(bun1)
with(summary(bun1), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)
confint(bun1)

# Minus precip
bun2 <- glm(MeanClosedist ~ scaledayl + scaletmax + scalendvi + scale6precip, data = jovenv, na.action = na.exclude)
summary(bun2)
with(summary(bun2), 1 - deviance/null.deviance)
confint(bun2)
```
